verses.verse: O come,<WH1980> let us sing<WH7442> unto the LORD:<WH3068> let us make a joyful noise<WH7321> to the rock<WH6697> of our salvation.<WH3468>
Let us come before<WH6923> his presence<WH6440> with thanksgiving,<WH8426> and make a joyful noise<WH7321> unto him with psalms.<WH2158>
For <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> is a great<WH1419> God,<WH410> and a great<WH1419> King<WH4428> above<WH5921> all<WH3605> gods.<WH430>
In his hand<WH3027> are the deep places<WH4278> of the earth:<WH776> the strength<WH8443> of the hills<WH2022> is his also.
The sea<WH3220> is his, and he<WH1931> made<WH6213> it: and his hands<WH3027> formed<WH3335> the dry<WH3006> land.
O come,<WH935> let us worship<WH7812> and bow down:<WH3766> let us kneel<WH1288> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> our maker.<WH6213>

For <WH3588> he<WH1931> is our God;<WH430> and we<WH587> are the people<WH5971> of his pasture,<WH4830> and the sheep<WH6629> of his hand.<WH3027> Today<WH3117> if<WH518> ye will hear<WH8085> his voice,<WH6963>
Harden <WH7185> not<WH408> your heart,<WH3824> as in the provocation,<WH4808> and as in the day<WH3117> of temptation<WH4531> in the wilderness: <WH4057>
When <WH834> your fathers<WH1> tempted<WH5254> me, proved<WH974> me, and<WH1571> saw<WH7200> my work.<WH6467>

Forty <WH705> years<WH8141> long was I grieved<WH6962> with this generation,<WH1755> and said,<WH559> It<WH1992> is a people<WH5971> that do err<WH8582> in their heart,<WH3824> and they<WH1992> have not<WH3808> known<WH3045> my ways: <WH1870>
Unto whom<WH834> I swore<WH7650> in my wrath<WH639> that<WH518> they should not enter<WH935> into<WH413> my rest.<WH4496>
